thread.title: Square Pie targets £2m from launch of ‘pie bond’
thread.title_full: Square Pie targets £2m from launch of ‘pie bond’

title: Square Pie targets £2m from launch of ‘pie bond’
text:
14 Jul 2015 | By Edward Devlin 
Gourmet pie business Square Pie, which has listings in Tesco and Ocado is aiming to raise up to £2m from a crowdfunding campaign to add new products to its supermarket range. Available to members only 
Learn more about our membership packages.
